message:
(Hiring)
job Title: senior php developer (Team Leader)
need: 1 developer 
Location: online
Working Hours: 8 hours
Days Off: Friday
Qualifications:
- practical experience in PHP development for large-scale, web-based applications using PHP Frameworks especially with codeigniter Framework.
- Solid grounding in the fundamentals of Object-Oriented Design and design patterns.
- Front-end skills with experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX and XML.
- Extensive knowledge of SQL databases - MySql is required.
- experience more than 3 years.
CVs to be sent to : php-hossam@tl4s.com (please write "senior PHP developer" in mail subject)
